item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Umm ya. Just hoping to shorten the queues, not farm honor with a 2-box setup. Not that we won't roll over if we happen to score an all-guild battleground.
item.content:encoded: Umm ya. Just hoping to shorten the queues, not farm honor with a 2-box setup. Not that we won’t roll over if we happen to score an all-guild battleground.

item.title: By: TheeNickster
item.dc:creator: TheeNickster
item.description: Two account X-ploits where you farm an alt for "honor" are probably why the queues give you zero options to choose your fight. They saw you comin' from a mile away. They need cross server queues, and they needs 'em bad!
item.content:encoded: Two account X-ploits where you farm an alt for “honor” are probably why the queues give you zero options to choose your fight. They saw you comin’ from a mile away. They need cross server queues, and they needs ’em bad!
